original_text: And I have also given thee that which thou hast not asked, both riches, and honour: so that there shall not be any among the kings like unto thee all thy days.
korean_text: 내가 또 네가 구하지 아니한 부귀와 영광도 네게 주노니 네 평생에 왕들 중에 너와 같은 자가 없을 것이라

sentences.original_text: And I have also given thee
that which thou hast not asked
so that there shall not be any among the kings
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 왕들 중에 너와 같은 자가

sentences.original_text: like unto thee all thy days
